content: this pattern was inspired by dragon s yarn of course you re a girl dragon from my shrek collection i wanted a simple pattern to show off the variegation of the yarn with enough texture to keep it interesting it s the perfect cowl for crisp autumn morning walks 18 stitches x 28 row in stockinette finished cowl 24 in circumference 8 wide the pattern is written for one size but it is easy to adjust if you would like a wider cowl just add pattern repeats materials 1 skein fleur ange apparel merino worsted or 185y/170m of a similar worsted weight yarn 4 5 mm us 7 16 circular needles stitch marker tapestry needle for weaving in ends pattern has been tested
